newsHero.heroTitle: Economic Development: Strategies for State and Local Practice

featureCallout.title: Tax reform
featureCallout.desc: Stay informed throughout the tax reform legislative process with this toolkit. It features the latest news and action items for retail real estate professionals.

featureCallout.title: ADA lawsuit reform
featureCallout.desc: Congress should restore the integrity of the American Disabilities Act by providing clearer rules for identifying and correcting access violations.

featureCallout.title: E-Fairness
featureCallout.desc: This legislation modernizes the sales tax collection system and levels the playing field between online-only sellers and brick and mortar retailers.

author.name: Juanita Stephens
author.text: I’m VP at JLL. I’m also a contributor on Forbes’ real estate beat, covering markets news, investing and personal finance. Prior to Forbes, I wrote about savings and credit at Money magazine and have also enjoyed short stints at CNNMoney and digital news start-up Kicker.

profileDetail.name: Corinne Daily
profileDetail.aboutText: Highly accomplished retail real estate professional with a vast network of landlords, retailers and brokers. Expertise across a wide variety of product types, geographies and uses. Consistently produces strong store openings and delivers measurable results through savvy lease negotiations. Skilled in deal structure on both Landlord and Retailer side. Proven ability to juggle multiple projects concurrently and quickly adapt to rapidly changing priorities. A tenacious negotiator with an uncommon focus on delivering superior results.

snapshots3.title: What drives us
snapshots3.cat1desc: Retail centers offer more than money — a place to hang out after work, walk around with a child or experience life offline. They enrich the social fabric of the places the world calls home.
snapshots3.cat2desc: Retail centers are essential to economic development, largely because of the property and sales taxes they generate. They also create jobs, buoy GDPs and fuel revenue everywhere they serve.
snapshots3.cat3desc: Retail real estate will shape the social practices, business policies and technologies of the future. We stay on the cutting edge and report what we find, helping members step into the future with efficiency.

textBlockLarge.text: We are the world leader in retail real estate conferences and deal-making events, hosting more than 300 a year and attracting a combined audience of 100,000 industry professionals. When you put our powerful exhibiting, advertising and sponsorship opportunities to work, you get visibility with impact. Here’s how.

subPage.headerDesc: We are the world leader in retail real estate conferences and deal-making events, hosting more than 300 a year and attracting a combined audience of 100,000 industry professionals. When you put our powerful exhibiting, advertising and sponsorship opportunities to work, you get visibility with impact. Here’s how.
subPage.secondaryBodyCopy1: As a sponsor or exhibitor at a regional deal-making conference or idea exchange, you could get in front of more than 8,000 industry stakeholders. Or target your customers with digital displays of your company name at a conference.
subPage.secondaryBodyCopy2: Our targeted audience helps you focus on qualified buyers in the global retail real estate industry. We reach more than 750,000 readers across the six industry magazine brands we publish, and many are distributed on-site at our conferences and exhibitions.
subPage.secondaryBodyCopy3: Place a banner ad on one of the most trafficked pages of ICSC.org, which has 110,000 unique monthly visitors and more than 1 million annual page views. Or, target your customer of choice with an ad on our mobile app or in weekly international e-newsletters.
